Name: Boothill
Desc: A cyborg cowboy drifting among the stars. Extremely optimistic and unrestrained.\nHe is a member of the Galaxy Rangers who swore to punish the wretched by any and all means...\nHis flamboyant and brash actions were all to draw the attention of the Interastral Peace Corporation — the target of his revenge.

1.Name: Dusty Trail's Lone Star
1.Desc: At the start of battle, obtain 1 stack of Pocket Trickshot, allowing Boothill to deal DMG that ignores <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of enemy target's DEF.

2.Name: Milestonemonger
2.Desc: When Pocket Trickshot is obtained via the Talent, regenerates <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> Skill Point(s) and increases Break Effect by <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> for <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> turn(s). This effect will also be triggered when obtaining Pocket Trickshot stacks that exceed the max.

3.Name: Marble Orchard's Guard
3.Desc: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>. Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>10</unbreak>.

4.Name: Cold Cuts Chef
4.Desc: When the enemy target in Standoff is attacked by Boothill, the DMG they receive increases by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>. When Boothill is attacked by the enemy target in Standoff, the effect of receiving more DMG is reduced by <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> on him.

5.Name: Stump Speech
5.Desc: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>. Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.

6.Name: Crowbar Hotel's Raccoon
6.Desc: When dealing Break DMG via the Talent, additionally deals Break DMG to the target equal to <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of the original DMG multiplier and deals Break DMG o adjacent targets equal to <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> of the original DMG multiplier.

131501.Name: Skullcrush Spurs
131501.Desc: Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Boothill's ATK to a single enemy.

131502.Name: Sizzlin' Tango
131502.Desc: Activate Standoff for Boothill and a target enemy, lasting for <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> turn(s). When there are no enemy targets on the field that have Standoff and can be attacked, dispel Standoff.\nWhen in Standoff, the enemy target is Taunted. Boothill cannot use his Skill and his Basic ATK Skullshatter Horseshoe is enhanced into Fanning the Hammer. When in Standoff, the enemy target / Boothill receives <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color>/<unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> more DMG when attacked by the other unit.\nThis Skill cannot regenerate Energy. This turn will not end after using this Skill.

131503.Name: Dust Devil's Sunset Rodeo
131503.Desc: There is a <unbreak>#5[i]%</unbreak> <u>base chance</u> to apply Physical Weakness to a target enemy, lasting for <unbreak>#4[i]</unbreak> turn(s).\nDeals Physical DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Boothill's ATK and to the target <u>delays their action</u>. The extent of the delay is equal to <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> of Boothill's Break Effect plus <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak>.

131504.Name: Five Peas in a Pod
131504.Desc: When the target with Standoff is defeated or Weakness Broken, dispels Standoff and Boothill receives 1 stack of Pocket Trickshot, up to <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> stack(s).\nWhile using Fanning the Hammer, if the enemy is <u>Weakness Broken</u>, deals Break DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Boothill's Physical <u>Break DMG</u> to this target for every stack of Pocket Trickshot on the basis of the target's max Toughness. The max Toughness cannot exceed <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak> of the Toughness reduced by a Basic ATK.\nAfter winning the battle, Boothill can retain Pocket Advantage for the next battle.

131506.Name: Attack
131506.Desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

131507.Name: 3-9× Smile
131507.Desc: After the Technique is used and when using this unit's Skill for the first time in the next battle, there is a <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> <u>base chance</u> to inflict Physical Weakness equal to the Ultimate to the target, lasting for <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> turn(s).

131508.Name: Fanning the Hammer
131508.Desc: Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Boothill's ATK to a single enemy target. For every stack of Pocket Trickshot, deals an additional hit with Physical DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> of Boothill's ATK to the target. This attack cannot regenerate Energy.\nFanning the Hammer cannot recover Skill Points, and can only target the enemy currently with Standoff.

1.PointDesc: Increase this character's CRIT Rate / CRIT DMG. The amount increased is equal to <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> / <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak> of Break Effect. CRIT Rate / CRIT DMG can be increased by a max of <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> / <unbreak>#4[i]%</unbreak>.
Decreases the DMG this character receives from targets not in Standoff by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.
When Pocket Trickshot is obtained via the Talent, regenerates <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> Energy. This effect will also be triggered when obtaining Pocket Trickshot stacks that exceed the max.
